div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 652 Suhaia, 35 km. E of Turnu Magurele, Rumania, 1964 Burial: after 77 B.C. Contents: c. 200 AR. Pot hoard Imit.Thasos: 2 spread-flan tetradr. Dyrrhachium: 5 dr. Roman Rep.: 8 den. Disposition: Turnu Magurele coll. 15 Chitescu, SCN 4 (1968), pp, 453-5
